title: "SK Telecom, SK Square and SK hynix Launch 'SK ICT Alliance' for Synergies"
excerpt: "At CES 2022, SK Telecom, SK Square and SK hynix announced the launch of the 'SK ICT Alliance' to jointly develop and invest in ICT convergence technologies, and create global market opportunities. The alliance comes as SK hynix celebrates the tenth year since joining the SK Group and SK Square successfully spun off from SK Telecom,"
